program main

implicit none

integer :: numNode, numEdge, a, b, i, pos

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: adj_count, visited

integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: adj_list

logical, dimension(:), allocatable :: odd

character(len=1000000) :: output_str

character(len=1) :: first_char

! Read input

read *, numNode, numEdge

allocate(adj_count(0:numNode-1), source=0)

allocate(adj_list(0:numNode-1, 0:numEdge-1))  ! assuming 0-based indices

do i = 1, numEdge

   read *, a, b

   a = a -1

   b = b -1

   adj_list(a, adj_count(a)) = b

   adj_count(a) = adj_count(a)

   adj_list(b, adj_count(b)) = a

   adj_count(b) = adj_count(b) +1

end do

! Check if numEdge is odd

if (mod(numEdge,2) /=0) then

   output_str = "-1"

else

   allocate(visited(0:numNode-1))

   allocate(odd(0:numNode-1))

   visited = 0

   odd = .false. output_str = ''

   call dfs(0, -1)

   deallocate(visited, odd)

end if

! Now process the output_str as per second program

! Find first newline

pos = index(output_str, achar(10)) if (pos ==0) then

   ! no newline, take entire string as first line

else

end if

! Increment ASCII value

integer :: c = ichar(first_char)

c = c +1

print *, achar(c)

program main

implicit none

integer :: numNode, numEdge, a, b, i, pos

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: adj_count, visited

integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: adj_list

logical, dimension(:), allocatable :: odd

character(len=1000000) :: output_str

character(len=1) :: first_char

! Read input

read *, numNode, numEdge

allocate(adj_count(0:numNode-1), source=0)

allocate(adj_list(0:numNode-1, 0:numEdge-1))  ! assuming 0-based indices

do i = 1, numEdge

   read *, a, b

   a = a -1

   b = b -1

   adj_list(a, adj_count(a)) = b

   adj_count(a) = adj_count(a) +1

   adj_list(b, adj_count(b)) = a

   adj_count(b) = adj_count(b) +1

end do

! Check if numEdge is odd

if (mod(numEdge,2) /=0) then

   output_str = "-1"

else

   allocate(visited(0:numNode-1))

   allocate(odd(0:numNode-1))

   visited = 0

   odd = .false.

   output_str = ''

   call dfs(0, -1)

   deallocate(visited, odd)

end if

! Now process the output_str as per second program

! Find first newline

pos = index(output_str, achar(10))

if (pos ==0) then

   ! no newline, take entire string as first line

   first_char = output_str(1:1)

else

   first_char = output_str(1:1)

end if

! Increment ASCII value

integer :: c = ichar(first_char)

c = c +1

print *, achar(c)

contains

recursive subroutine dfs(crt, parent)

integer, intent(in) :: crt, parent

integer :: child, i

visited(crt) =1

do i =0, adj_count(crt)-1

   child = adj_list(crt,i)

   if (child == parent .or. visited(child) ==1) then

      continue

   else if (visited(child) ==2) then

      ! append (crt+1, child+1)

      write(output_str, '(a,i0,a,i0,a)') trim(output_str), crt+1, ' ', child+1, char(10)

      odd(crt) = .not. odd(crt)

   else

      call dfs(child, crt)

      if (odd(child)) then

         write(output_str, '(a,i0,a,i0,a)') trim(output_str), child+1, ' ', crt+1, char(10)

         odd(child) = .not. odd(child)

      else

         write(output_str, '(a,i0,a,i0,a)') trim(output_str), crt+1, ' ', child+1, char(10)

         odd(crt) = .not. odd(crt)

      end if

   end if

end do

visited(crt) =2

end subroutine dfs

end program main
